About Me

I am a self motivated and self driven developer with a passion for creating software solutions from ideas and perspective of others. I am constantly learning new skills and technologies to stay focused on current software development trends. I have many years of experience developing applications in an enterprise setting. In the past several years I have been pursuing web development to become a full stack web application and software developer.
